properties.areaDesc: Mackinac Island/Bois Blanc Island; Southeast Chippewa
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 11 at 12:30PM EST until January 12 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Gusty northeast to north winds,
especially early tonight. Significant blowing and drifting
snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches.

* WHERE...Southeast Chippewa County, along Mackinac and Bois
Blanc Islands.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 8 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could
significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM EST SUNDAY
